channel.title: Finance on r-mas
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on r-mas

item.title: Scraping Historical Prices using Bloomberg API
item.description: Introduction This post is a soft update to my previous post on Exploring UITFs in the Philippines. One limitation of that study is that the historical prices used were limited to the past 12 months only. In this post, I’m going to share how to scrape up to 5 years worth of historical prices from Bloomberg.com. Bloomberg “bulk-time-series” API I owe a big thanks to this wonderful article on finding the API by Greg Reda.

item.title: Exploring UITFs in the Philippines
item.description: Introduction Exploring the Data Timeline Bank Portfolios Starting Capital Fund Categories Analyzing Performance Top Performing UITFs Performance by Fund Classification Analyzing Risk Conclusion Introduction This post is the second part of a series of posts about Unit Investment Trust Funds or UITFs in the Philippines.

item.title: Scraping Web Data on UITFs using R
item.description: Introduction Surveying active UITFs Gathering UITF symbols Cleaning up Augmenting the dataset Gathering UITF Information Merging all_uitfs and fund_info Scraping Historical Price Data Summary Introduction This post is an example of scraping the web for specific data we would like to have for analysis. In this example, I’m going to gather data on UITFs in the Philippines.
